snippet: Manchester United earned a 4-0 victory over helpless Wigan, while Manchester City beat Stoke City, 3-0.
abstract: Manchester United earned 4-0 victory over Wigan, while Manchester City beat Stoke City, 3-0, to begin year in the English Premier League.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United earned a 4-0 victory over helpless Wigan, while Manchester City beat Stoke City, 3-0.

headline.seo: Manchester United Beats Wigan, 4-0, to Keep Lead in Premier League
headline.main: United and City Hold Ground in Premier League
